I wonder why people like that even bother drawing hentai. The first page suggests something very different than it is, which admittedly is a matter of taste, but really looks comparatively interesting... But then what it really is is the most standard filler anime/hentai woman drawings... I wasn't into that roughly 1.5 years after I learnt of the existence of hentai or drawn porn. I always preferred specific characters or "aesthetic girls", which accidenally tended to be more teenage or so (which I just think is objective feminine sexiness). With exceptions. Concrete: Misty from Pokemon, but also Jessie from Pokemon. That sort of thing... The Jessie types would usually drawn like ugly fat cows (rather than what she really looks like, with nice ass and figure), and so Misty won out more and more.

This is very cute. The backdrop of friendship, the nostalgia of the past, and a girl who lived in the city returning to her province all invoke the feeling of the passage of time. The dissonance was strong at first, to the boy anyway. Confused between his old friend and the beautiful person who might as well be a stranger.The little reminders helped  conjoin whatever he was feeling. Fondness for the memory of his friend, bashfulness to the stranger, attraction to the beautiful woman, and lust for her body. It all coalesced into love. Wonderful beautiful love. Her dress at the end was perfect.
